hero.title: Saketh
hero.subtitle: Tarnished Developer
hero.tagline: Guided by Grace, Forged in Code

about.description: A Tarnished who rose from obscurity to build scalable systems across the Lands Between. Full-stack architect crafting resilient, elegant solutions that would make Marika proud.
about.quote: The guidance of grace shall lead thee to the Elden Throne.
